references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the field of high-resolution image generation using diffusion models, which ConceptMaster builds upon for video generation.

references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This paper introduces a significant advancement in text-to-video generation, providing a strong foundation for ConceptMaster's approach to video personalization.

references.paper_title: Animatediff: Animate your personalized text-to-image diffusion models without specific tuning
references.reason: This is highly relevant because ConceptMaster addresses similar challenges in video customization as Animatediff tackles in image animation, offering valuable insights and techniques.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is a cornerstone of ConceptMaster, enabling effective multimodal embedding for concept representation and alignment.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is crucial because ConceptMaster uses a diffusion model based on transformer architecture, improving upon the efficiency and quality of video synthesis.
